did.unittitle: Edward J. Roberts last will and testament
did.abstract: The last will and testament of Edward J. Roberts, written September 6, 1883 and proved April 2, 1884. The document was issued by the Kings County Surrogate Court and signed by the Court Clerk.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection consists of a single document.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Edward J. Roberts had two sons, Everard and Dominique, and two daughters, Fenella and Winifred. His sister Mary Morris lived in England and had one daughter, Sarah Ellwood.
